SCTX:
Begin GloomyCaveScript

short nolore

if ( GetJournalIndex "BM_WolfGiver" < 30 )
	Disable 
	"furn_com_cauldron_unique"->Disable
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex "BM_WolfGiver" >= 30 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex "BM_WolfGiver" < 80 )
		Enable
		"furn_com_cauldron_unique"->Enable
	endif
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex "BM_WolfGiver" >= 80 )
	if ( CellChanged == 1 )
		"furn_com_cauldron_unique"->Disable
		Disable
	endif
endif


End GloomyCaveScript
